#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Position.

== Name ==

*[CPosition Position]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Position (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Coordinate of a point. The coordinate of a point can be either a GPS coordinate or
			coordinates in any specific system.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  ([CPositionGPS position-gps] | [CRoomForExtension position-other]) </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CPositionGPS golfml:PositionGPS] || [CPositionGPS position-gps] ||  					GPS coordinate of a point.				 ||
|| [CRoomForExtension golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension position-other] ||  					Coordinate of a point in an arbitraty unit system.				 ||

===  Sub Types ===
{{{
    	[CPosition {http://code.google.com/p/golfml}Position] (restriction)  |    +--[CPositionWithSequence {http://code.google.com/p/golfml}PositionWithSequence] (extension)
}}}
----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPointOfInterest PointOfInterest], [CPositionWithSequence PositionWithSequence], [CStrokeDetail StrokeDetail]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Position">  <xs:choice>    <xs:element name="position-gps" type="golfml:PositionGPS">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="position-other" type="golfml:RoomForExtension">    </xs:element>  </xs:choice></xs:complexType>
----
